definition: transversely, in the shape of (a horizontal piece on) a cross
details:
adverb
- transversely
= synonyms: across
- not in the intended manner
= example: not in the intended manner
adjective
- in the shape of (a horizontal piece on) a cross
- lying or extending across the length of a thing or in a cross direction
= example: lying or extending across the length of a thing or in a cross direction
